vote.title: To honor, recognize, and celebrate the life of Sheldon Paley and to extend our sincerest condolences to his family and friends.
vote.description:
Title
 
To honor, recognize, and celebrate the life of Sheldon Paley and to extend our sincerest condolences to his family and friends.
 
Body
WHEREAS, Sheldon was born on August 31st, 1936 and passed away peacefully on October 13th, 2024 at the age of 88; and
 
WHEREAS, Sheldon was known for his spirited demeanor, his commitment to his community, and his dedication to his family; and
 
WHEREAS, Sheldon graduated from the University of Pennsylvania School of Dentistry and practiced dentistry for over 40 years, later transitioning into a successful real-estate career for more than 25 years; and
 
WHEREAS, Sheldon was a proud founder of the Reynoldsburg Tomato Festival, a testament to his community spirit which brought joy to many; and
 
WHEREAS, family and friends came first for Sheldon. He was a beloved husband, father, and grandfather who left his family with cherished memories of their time together; now therefore,
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That we do hereby share our deepest condolences with the Paley family and honor, recognize, and celebrate the life of Sheldon Paley.
